OOC: WELCOME BACK !!!!!! :)


Windlord/Trinity.

Windlord was almost ready to answer to Pyrotaur when he received 
Grounded's comm link;Windlord opened his comm link and he answered 
Grounded "GRounded!!! I'm in the conference room. Can you come here?"

Trinity was sleeping near the cr, where Grounded was.





--- In nbwrpg@y..., gunthers@t... wrote:
> OOC: If any of this is wrong jsut inform me....I missed you guys...
> 
> BIC
> Grounded awoke finally from what seemed to be an eternity 
dreaming.  
> He found himself wired and tubed to a CR chair.  He tried to 
remember 
> back to his dream.  It was one of his arch enemy once again.  That 
> damnation was somewhere on this planet, and it was now clear to 
> Grounded that he must find, and eliminate him.
> 
> He listened and smelled, everything seemed to be in order with his 
> senses.  His radar told him no one was around.
> 
> Opening his link to the Chivtron base, he spoke through the 
> intercom.  "Grounded to all Chivtrons,  I'm alive, and I need a 
> desperate fill in. Copy?"
